title: Omulenzi ne enkembo
description: Omulenzi ya binga enkembo okutuka mu kibira,  bwe yamala yaiba amenvu ge. Eira bafuka ba mukwanho.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Eiresi Keda Okokuke
description: Kolo eboyete eiresi keda okokuke kakwap. Konye anu adedeng na ike koku,  abu ekabaka ijuka kes aiboi akuju ne emamaete itunga.
author: Betty Atima

title: Ekibonerezo
description: kibonerezo ki ekiweebwa omwana owomululu alya ebibala byonna natalekerawo banne?
author: Annet Ssebaggala

title: Pendo ente yaife
description: Olufumo olugema ku nte eyagonzebwanga einho.
author: David  Bamukangwiire

title: Ekyalekire ekikere ikyathabya  kibuya
description: Ekikere kyanganabere kibuya nge'kihangalha kukyahulikirira!
author: Jenipher  Kabugho

title: The Boy and the Monkey
description: A boy chases a monkey into the forest,  after it steals his bananas. Later they become friends.
author: Cassandra Nabatanzi

title: Ankamafio
description: Gbekɛ nuu ko ni kɛ gbekɛbii kobɔlɔi komɛi hi shi yɛ gbɛjegbɛ lɛ nɔ. Eji ewala mli deŋmegbomɔ sane ko kɛ bɔ ni shihilɛ lɛ tsake feesɛɛ bɔ ni sa.
author: Elizabeth Ocansey (OLE Ghana)

title: Lwaki Wakikere Mubi Nnyo?
description: Olugero luno lukwata kungeri wamunya gye yalumbamu mukwano gwe wakikere olwo bubalagavu bwe.
author: Ritah Katetemera

title: Ekibonherezo
description: Kibonherezo ki ekigheebwa omwana ogh'omululu alya ebiibala byonhabyonha natalekeragho bainhe?
author: Emmanuel  Kunya

title: Mor Koth Kodi Lith Koth
description: Mor koth gi wode,  ma ilwongo ni,  lith koth,  cango jo bedo i piny ka gi ji. To paka lith koth obendo nyathi ma jamidida aka kiriwidhi ma ki winji kir min,  kere oryemo jo woko i piny to dhiro jo kidho bedo i polo.
author: Owino Ogot

title: Ndalo le Pendo – Bagwera ba bakaonekaone!
description: Ndalo o thuša tatagwe go hlokomela kgomo ya bona yeo e bitšwago Pendo gore ba kgone go mo fa tšhelete ya go ithekela dipuku.
author: Dikeledi Queen Shai

title: Thunder and Lightning
description: Thunder and her son,  lightning,  lived on earth amongst people. Due to her destructive,  naughty son the king sent them to live in the sky away from people.
author: Athieno Gertrude

title: Wakikere Ne Wamunya
description: Obutawuliriza ndwadde mbi era abantu bangi batuuse mu mbeera enzibu enyyo lwakuba tebawuliriza nga babannyonnyola.
author: Parents

title: Kgomo eso Pendo
description: Pale ya kgomo e ratwang haholo ya lelapa.
author: Tseliso Masolane

title: Magozwe
description: Ɛfa abarimaa bi a na ɔne ne mfɛfo deda abɔnten so esiane sɛ na wonni fie a wɔda mu. Amiadi ne akukuruhwease yi nyinaa akyi no,  abarimaa yi abrabɔ hyɛɛ ase sesa yɛɛ papa.
author: Michael Baah-Agyeman (OLE Ghana)

title: Okusalirwa  omusango
description: Kibonhiobonhio ki ekigwana omwana ow'omuluvu?
author: Isaac Mapiti

title: Omulinzi W'Enyamaiswa Najunira Wansuku
description: Wansuku nakwatirwa mumutego gwa Yokana. Wansuku ayamirra nayenda kumujunira. Yokana akakoraki?
author: Kate Kajumba

title: Thunder and her son
description: Thunder and her son,  lived on earth. Due to her destructive son the king sent them to live in the sky away from people.
author: African Storybook

title: Kulwaki ekirenga kyabbiighire inho
description: Ekirenga kyandi bbaire kinyirira nga okidolo singuli kyaghulisisirye!
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Eshinyasio
description: Omusiani omulang'u anyola eshinyasio.
author: Khabukoshe ASb Team

title: Magozwe
description: 'n Seun beland op straat saam met ander straatkinders. Die verhaal laat 'n mens nadink. Dit daag jou ook uit wanneer jy lees hoe die seun se lewe verbeter.
author: Fanie Viljoen

title: Ndalo le Pendo – Metswalle ya sebele!
description: Ndalo o thusa ntate wa hae ho hlokomela Pendo,  kgomo ya lelapa,  hore a amohele tjhelete ya pokotho eo a e sebedisetsang ho ithekela dibuka.
author: Matilda Dube

title: Omuliro.
description: Olugero luno lusomesa abaana abato obulabe obuli mukuzanyisa omuliro.Era basanye okugwewala.
author: Cissy Namugerwa

title: Sijeziso saBobo
description: Sabayini sijeziso semfana lonemona lotsandza kudla kakhulu?
author: Busile Ndhlovu

title: Ndalo le Pendo – Ditsala tsa nnete
description: Ndalo o thusa rragwe go tlhokomela Pendo kgomo ya lelapa gore a kgone go fiwa madi a go ithekela dibuka.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Hulwasi ehere liiboneha buubi muno
description: Ehele lyandi bele liboneha bulayi liba lyawulila.
author: Nasirumbi Lynn

title: ماقزوي
description: في مدينة نيروبي الصاخبة، بعيداً عن الحياة العائلية ودفئها، يعيش مجموعة من الصبيان بدون مأوى. كانوا يستقبلون كل يوم كما يأتي، لا أمل لهم فيه
author: Maaouia Haj Mabrouk

title: Nkuba na Mirabyo
description: Nkuba n'umuhungu we Mirabyo babanaga n'abantu ku isi. Bitewe n''uko Mirabyo yarangwaga n'imyitwarire mibi yo kwangiza,  umwami yarabaciye ngo bajye gutura mu kirere kure y'abantu.
author: Aloysie Uwizeyemariya

title: Omululu gw'obusika
description: Olugero luno luli ku baana abalulunkanira ebyobusika.
author: Francis  Bananwa

title: Thabo naJamludi
description: Thabo usita babe wakhe kunakekela Jamludi inkhomo yemndeni kute akwati kutitfolela imadlana latayisebentisa ekutitsengeleni tincwadzi.
author: Fakazile Armooh

title: Cat and Dog and the Ball
description: Long-time friends Cat and Dog enjoy some fun time playing ball.
author: Elke and René Leisink

title: Lwaki Walulenga aboneka bubi
description: Walulenga yandibaire mulungi nga Waidolome singa yali awulirisa.
author: Charles Eramaga

title: Magozwe
description: Abarimaa bi a ɔde ne ho kɔbɔɔ ne mfɛfoɔ kɔtenaa abɔnten so. Ɛyɛ abasɛm a,  ɔhaw ne abɛbrɛsɛ wɔ mu nanso ne nyinaa akyire no nsesaɛ papa baeɛ.
author: Agnes Asamoah-Duodu (OLE Ghana)

title: Ngurumo na Radi
description: Ngurumo na mwanawe,  radi,  waliishi miongoni mwa watu. Lakini,  kwa ajili ya uharibifu wa mwanawe,  mfalme aliwafukuza waishi angani,  mbali na watu.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Omunhazi
description: Mutome yagemanga abantu munsawo muTuleeni. Lulala omukono gwe gwalobera musawo ya Mmamotosi. Abaasabaze baali banhiivu inho olwebikolwa ebyo kuba obusawo bwaibwe bwababulangaku inho mu Tuleeni omwo. Abakuumi ba Tuleeni baayetebwa Matome yagemebwa yaigalilwa.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Akidodok Nabworok
description: Erono akirok ng'akiro napenyepedorosi.
author: Lolupe teachers

title: Magozwe
description: Mwana musankwa walijana mumazila antoomwe abeezinyina bambi batajisi ankobazulilwa. Aaya makani apa kuyeeya muntu naalanga mbwapenga mukati mubuumi bwakwe pele alimwi ambozicinca zintu kutalika kuba kabotu.
author: Vision Milimo

title: Cona Galu Ndi Mpira
description: Cona ndi Galu asewera ndi mpira. Mpira uli ndi utoto wofiira,  wobiliwira ndi wamsipu.
author: Lusaka Teachers

title: Ngurumo na mwanawe Radi
description: Ngurumo na mwanawe waliishi duniani. Kwa ajili ya uharibifu wa mwanawe,  mfalme aliwatuma kuishi angani mbali na watu.
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Oyuyut
description: Matome ono yutu jami pa dano ki'i gaa. Nino moo cinge omok i gicaa pa Mmamontsho. Luwot cwiny gi cwer matek pyen jami gi oryweny ki i gaa kenyo. Ki lwongo ogwok kuc i gaa gu bino gu mako Matome woko.
author: Maurice Lamony

title: Pendo yinkhomo yakitsi
description: Indzaba lephatselene nekhomo leyayitsandvwa ngumndeni wayo.
author: Fakazile Armooh

title: Te Naoh Pendo
description: Solmerɔ aa naa bieb ka nɔŋ bo. Solmerɔ aa naa bieb ka nɔŋ bo.
author: J. K. A. Anankor and E. T. Anoeni (OLE Ghana)

title: Lukuba ni mutabane
description: Lukuba ni mutabane Lughemya baali baba ku nsi era nga baba ghalala n'abantu. Aye,  olw'okuba mutabane oyo yali mwonooni wa bintu ate nga era wa kisundhe,  Kyabazinga yaababinga kuno baje babe ku igulu ezira bantu.
author: Daudi Waidhuuba-Isendabaguzi

title: Injangwe, Imbwa n'Umupira
description: Kera habayeho Injangwe n' Imbwa bikaba byari incuti cyane bigakunda kwishimisha bikina umupira.
author: Jean Paul Harelimana

title: Magozwe
description: Munyamata mung'ono azipeza pa museu pamozi na anyamata ena alibe mabanja. Iyi ni nkani yopasa maganizo, kuonesa zovuta za umoyo wake na mwamene zonse ziyamba kusinta kuyamba kunkala bwino.
author: Bether Mwale Moyo

title: Pickpocketer
description: Matome used to pickpocket inside the train.One day his hand got stuck in Mmamontsho's handbag.The passengers were very angry about his actions because they lost their purse and wallets in the train.The train Gaurds was called and Matome got arrested
author: Kate Nkwane

title: Porquê a Rã É Tão Feia?
description: A rã poderia ser tão bonita como o lagarto se ela quisesse ouvir!
author: Jorge Eusébio Eusébio

title: Wakkappa ne wambwa n'omupiira
description: Abomukwano wakkapa ne wambwa banyumirwa 0mupiira.
author: Nambakire Rosemary

title: ነጎዳ ምስ ወዳ
description: ነጎዳ ምስ ወዳ ኣብ መሬት እዮም ይነብሩ ነይሮም። ብምኽያት ጥፍኣት ወዳ፣ ካብ ሰብ ርሒቖም ኣብ ሰማይ ክነብሩ ንጉስ ወሲንሎም።
author: Angesom Abadi

title: Magozwe
description: Bidɔɔlee kaŋa naŋ poɔ o taaba biweɛmɛ poɔ ka ba tuulo sokpoŋ sɔrɔ dire. A senseloŋ wulo la teɛroŋ,  ane lɛnɛɛ a bie naŋ mɔɔ ne o nyɔvore ka o te yi tɔna ko o.
author: Raphael Lieber (OLE Ghana)

title: Ndalo na Pendo – Khonani dza mbiluni
description: Ndalo u thusa khotsi awe kha u londa (ṱhogomela) Pendo kholomo ya afho muḓini a tshi itela u wana tshelede ya u renga bugu.
author: Ndivhuho  Mutsila

title: O Porquê Do Sapo Ser Tão Feio
description: O Sapo poderia ser tão bonito como o Lagarto se ele apenas tivesse ouvido!
author: Translators without Borders

title: Omupiira gwange ogwa kasaayi
description: Omupiira gwa kasaayi omubba guja mu lugendo.
author: Enocha Tasingika

title: abwenki ekikyele ni kibi
description: Ekikyere kurikyabonire nke'ekinya kuriyahurire.
author: Rukundo Joshia

title: Agu Anitua Be E'Yo Ni Ndele Ra
description: There was a young man who thought he was wiser than anyone young or old around him. He said so to everyone including his wife. However, his wife's father proved to him that “old is wiser than young”.
author: Doris Maandebo

title: Magozwe
description: Bidibili so n-daa zaŋ o maŋa nti pahi o taba zuɣu n-lee pala zuɣu bihi. Ŋɔ nyɛla tɛhimuɣisirili lahibali zaŋ chaŋ o biɛhigu polo,  ni di ni niŋ shɛm ka biɛhigu maa ti taɣi niŋ viɛnyɛliŋga.
author: Adam Issa Vice (OLE Ghana)

title: Epuusi,  embwa  n'omupiira
description: Eira einho ab'omukwano bano puusi n'embwa baayenda okwesanhusaamu nga basamba omupiira.
author: Isaac Mapiti

title: Ndalo na Pendo – Vanghana lavakulu
description: Ndalo u pfuna tata wakwe ku hlayisa Pendo ku nga homu ya ndyangu kutani a kuma malinyana leyi a yi tirhiselaka ku tixavela tibuku.
author: Mduduzi Benjie Shongwe

title: Omupiira Gwange Omulando
description: A big red ball goes on a journey.
author: Kaguja Education Center

title: አዋቂው ሰውዬ
description: አዋቂው ሰውዬ እኔ ከታላቆቼ ሁሉ አውቃለሁ የሚል ሰውዬ ታሪክ ነው።
author: ከድር ኢብራሂም

title: How the Supreme Court Makes Decisions
Inkhosi Nendvodzana Yayo
description: Indzaba imayelana nenkhosi leyayitsandza igolide kanye nengcebo kakhulu. Lenkhosi yayinendvodzana leyayiyitsandza kakhulu. Lenkhosi yaya enyangeni ngalelinye lemalanga kuyocela umutsi wokutsi konkhe lakubambhako kugucuke igolide. Yawutfola inkhosi lowo mutsi,  yatsi inyanga layokubambha kucala ngakusasa ekuseni kuyawuphendvuka igolide. Ngenhlanhla lembhi inkhosi yabambha indvodzana yayo kucala ekuseni. Yaphendvuka iglide leso sikhatsi lendvodzana yayo. Yabuyela enyangeni kuyocela umutsi wokugucula indvodzana yayo ibuyele ibe ngumuntfu futsi. Yatsengisa bonkhe bucwebe bayo njengekusho kwenyanga. Ywgucuka yaba ngumuntfu kahle futsi indvodzana yenkhosi. Inkhosi ayiphindzanga yatsandza bucwebe kakhulu. Baphila imphilo lenhle kusukela lapho.
author: Nkosinathi Gift Nkambule

title: Kaze Nja Ni Mbola
description: Kaze ni nja nezilaha mbola. Mbola ifa situwa sa ndu.
author: Lusaka Teachers

title: Kungani sicoco sibe sibi
description: Kube sicoco salalela ngabe sihle njengemgolololo!
author: Busile Ndhlovu

title: Mokasa
description: Bi nyumu mamikpaagbe ko ya bɔ juami kɛ mamikpaagbebi komɛ.
author: Divine Apedo

title: Omusaadha Kalimagezi
description: Yaliyo omusaadha ni baghala be musanvu. Baali ba mpisa inho. Yaayenda okubafumbiza. Aye nga buli musaadha ku kyalo abeeyendeza. Yakola atya?
author: Irene  Bakita

title: Inyungu yafwa
description: Biantaka yanyoola inyungu ikhoongo. Omumenyanwa we nakosia inyungu yiye.
author: Catherine Were

title: The Wise Man
description: A young man believes that youth know better than their elders. His father-in-law, an old man, has different ideas about the matter!
author: Cornelius Wekunya

title: Cat and Dog and the butterfly
description: Cat and Dog look through the window. They look through the window,  then Cat and Dog see a butterfly!
author: Elke and René Leisink

title: Magozwe
description: A boy finds himself on the street with other street children. This is a thoughtful,  challenging story about his life and how it begins to change for the better.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Hikuyini a Kheli Gi Svarili
description: Frog might have been as beautiful as Lizard if he would only listen!
author: Rafael Ernesto Samuel

title: Inkhosi Yetilwane
description: Lendzaba ikhuluma ngetilwane tasendle lebetingenayo inkhosi. Letilwane tabona kutsi kuncono kutsi tikhetse inkhosi ngenca yekubona kutsi imphilo yato imatima ngaphandle kwenkhosi. kwase sekutsiwa nguloyo naloyo akatisho kubaluleka kwakhe uma afuna kuba inkhosi.Tilwane lebetifuna sikhundla sekuba yinkhosi kwaba: indlovu, logwaja,lufudvu,lukwezi,inyoka indlulamitsi,ingwe, kanye nelibhubezi. Ekugcineni letilwane takhetsa libhubezi kutsi kube ngilo inkhosi yato ngoba lasho nekuso phela kutsi lingatidla tonkhe tilwane tasendle.
author: Banele Thabethe

title: Omusaala
description: omugaso  gwe misi hu musaala
author: Mubbalya Charles

title: /Gui//nâ Gomas xa
description: /Gui//nâ tsî garuǂare goma-e ǀnaits ge mû hâ i?
author: Mattheus  Goraseb

title: Inviting a giraffe to tea
description: Set in Uganda,  Africa,  a group of five animals found a way to not only get along but also enjoy being with each other.
author: Patty  Huston-Holm

title: Kiti na Imbwa neShavishavi
description: Kiti na Imbwa vanotarisa kunze nepahwindo. Vanotarisa nepahwindo,  vobva vaona shavishavi!
author: Lilian Chaminuka

title: Magozwe
description: Ŋutsuvi aɖe si va tsi kpɔdome kple kpɔdomevi bubuwo.Ŋutinya sia ƒo nu tso ale si agbenɔnɔ va zu tamebubu kple agbedofui na ŋutsuvi la kpakple ale si agbenɔnɔ va de asi nyonyo me nɛ la ŋuti.
author: Kumah Godwin Kwaku (OLE Ghana)

title: Omusaija Ayalyaga Wenka
description: Omu biro byaira muno hakaba haroho omusaija ayagonzaga kulya wenka na munu muno obu yabaga eri nyama.
author: Solomon  Kasaija

title: Omusajja Omugezi
description: Omulenzi omuto asubira nti abavubuka bamanyi nnyo okusinga abakadde. Mukoowe, omusajja omukadde alina endowooza ezenjawulo kunsonga eno.
author: Kayinga Muddu Yisito

title: Sa'a Gaafa Tokko Qabdu
description: Sa'a gaafa tokko qofa qabdu fi jireenya ishee.
author: Mulualem Daba

title: Magozwe
description: Banyimba bi ehyia mboframba bi wɔ stiiti mu. Iyi yɛ asɛm bi a ogye adwen wɔ n'abrabɔ ho na mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ ma aye yie ama no.
author: Kwesi Biney (OLE Ghana)

title: Ekebusi, Esese amo ne'ekegwankwa
description: Ekebusi amo ne'sese nigo bikorigereria korwa etirisa. Bikorigerei korwa etirisa,  nario erio biaroche ekegwankwa.
author: Gladys Nyachieo

title: Inyang and the Bird
description: A story of a Turkana herds boy who spent many days hungry away from home.
author: Simon Ipoo

title: Omusatsa Wa Mbeli Omukhasi Wa Mbeli
description: A story about how people came into being and populated the earth. They rise in snake like form from  the depths of a dark cold pool into a sunlit world of colour, undergoing the changes that are needed to live in their  new world.
author: Amateshe Margaret

title: Uwe Lukyesikyesi Ukhaanyalisa Khukhwiwonesa Umweene Ta
description: Umusaani umuhele ashifukiilisa ari basooleli baamanya naabi khuufuurakho baasakhulu. Paapawe umumasaala uulu umusaakhulu, ali ni shishambaaso shaburaawa
author: Fabian Wakholi

title: Ipusi nende Imbwa nende Imburukuru
description: Ipusi nende Imbwa tsirenga mulidirisha ne tsilola Imburukuru.
author: Peter Wanga

title: Magozwe
description: Magozwe vit dans la rue avec d'autres enfants. Cette une histoire riche et pleine de defis qui parle de sa vie et de sa métamorphose.
author: Patricia Roth

title: Dhyaŋ Ma Ja Tunge Acel
description: Kigana ma tito cal gi kula pa dhyaŋ.
author: Owino Ogot

title: Omusaadha Omugezigezi
description: Omulenzi omuto aloghoza nti obavubuka bananhi inho okusinga abakaile. Mukaire wo omusaadha omukaire,  ali ne endoghooza eyedhaghulo ku nsonga eno.
author: Inhebantu Alice-Muloki Memorial Library

title: Ikati, inja novemvane
description: Ikati nenja zilunguza efasiteleni. Zabheka zabhekisisa,  zabona uvemvane!
author: Pumla Mdontswa

title: Omuseere Omufubbi
description: Yaliyo omufubbi eyi nabaŋerehera mwigulu. Hu ngira omufubbi bamunyagaho engoye.
author: Margret Bugohe

title: Inyang and the Bird
description: A story of a Turkana herdboy who spent many days hungry away from home.
author: Simon Ipoo

title: Magozwe
description: Kebia ko nɛ e ya tu kebɔrbi so be mbia a wɔ kebɔrbi so. Nɛ kananɛ e fara a charga,  a nya kebaawɔtɔ ela,  be keblɔmbi.
author: Chief A-R. Adam (OLE Ghana)

title: Cow with one horn
description: Have you ever seen a cow with only one horn and no tail?
author: Khothatso Ranoosi

title: Mbaka na Ngitĩ na kĩmbalutya
description: Mbaka na Ngitĩ masisyilye ndĩlĩsyana,  na ĩndĩ moona kĩmbalutya.
author: Anna Kula

title: What Does the US Supreme Court Say About Guns?
Inyang ne'kinhonhi
description: Olufumo olwo'mwaana omu Turana nga mwaayi eyalambuka endhala nga tali ghaka.
author: Antony Kisambira

title: Omusaadha Omugezigezi
description: Omulenzi omuto aloghoza nti obavubuka bananhi inho okusinga abakaile. Mukaile ghe,  omusaadha omukaile,  alina endoghoza eye dhaghulo ku nsonga eno.
author: Raymond Waiswa

title: Omushuma Kakulu
description: Kakulu n'omusheija wa Bendo village kuguga kare. Y'atakwenda okuhinga n'okukora ekintu kyona. Bakamukwata  omumisiri eya Mukasa.
author: Mark Byamugisha

title: Agulu Na Atoani
description: Ayakar Byantaka igulu,  nabo asaki ng'esi naapolon noi. Abu ng'esi kitumia ng'atameta keng anyunia agulu naapolon. Nakanene pe aria erot ajokon.
author: Simon Ipoo

title: Saniya mai ƙaho Ɗaya
description: Ka taɓa ganin saniya mai ƙaho ɗaya kuma maras Jela kuwa?
author: Muhammad Umar

title: Inzu Yanjye
description: Iyi ni inzu yanjye ntuyemo,  nyunzwe n'amafi n'ihene.
author: Janviere Micomyiza

title: Magozwe
description: Umulumendo aisanga mumusebo pamo nabalumendo bambi ababulwe ndupwa. Ili lyashi lipeela ifyakutontonkanyapo pa buumi bwakwe neefyo bwaaluka bwawaminako.
author: Eunice Mukonde-Mulenga

title: Niawu na mbwua na kipekapeka
description: Niawu na bwua bakotala na ezibeli. Tango bakotala na ezibeli,  niawu na bwua bamoni kipekapeka.
author: Theresa  Nyemba

title: Omutamivu  ow'omwenge
description: Olufumo luno lugemaganha eyali nga anwa inho omwenge yaghamu n'akabona,  era yadhuluka ni mubatu era yafanaana ekitagasa.
author: Emmanuel  Kunya

title: Omuti Ogw'Omuyembe Omubbedde

Inomelusi oyithandayo lenkomo, uyifundise nokuthi ilalele izwi layo lodwa kuphela. Ihlale iyodwa lenkomo uma umhlambi uya emadlelweni uyodla ngoba iyisilwi. Ezinye izinkomo nabantu bayayisaba le nkomo, ngoba iyalwa ngephondo layo elilodwa.

title: Ipeet Yen Acuwa
description: Icamunit ipeet yen obu omodomod ajele itoni ajawun akiring na'dakit.

Udumbana ubethwa livalo ngombana akakwazi ukududa, nanyana kunjalo ipungutjha itjele udumbana bona uzamusiza bona afumane indlela elula yokududa. Kazi ipungutjha izamusiza kwamambala udumbana?

title: Magozwe

description: Jackal falls into a well and his calls for help are heard by Donkey. Jackal tells Donkey that he wants someone to swim with him in the cool water. Donkey hesitates because he isn't good at swimming,  but Jackal promises to help the donkey. Will sly Jackal keep his word?

description: Mvulana mdogo anajipata mtaani pamoja na watoto wengine wanaorandaranda. Katika hali ya kujitafutia,  anakutana na mtu ambaye anabadilisha maisha yake.

author: Nobuhle Mngadi

title: Ágúpí Òkò Rɨ̀ Pɨ Òkʉ́ Òkò Rɨ̀ Be

'Bá 'dɨ̀yɨ èfʉ̌ drɨ́á engázʉ́ yí àlíó álírʉ́ bɨ̀zàrʉ́ àzɨ́nɨ ambɨ́zàrʉ́ rɨ̀ mà ètɨ́á 'dálá kɨ̀lé órí lé ecázʉ́ wúdrìkúrù ètú mà drɨzà be àzɨ́nɨ wúrá be ndrɨ̀zàrʉ́ rɨ̀ mà drɨ̀á. Yɨ nɨ́ èfʉ̀zʉ́ nyákú drìá rɨ̀á, órɨ́ 'dɨ̀yɨ ojá yɨ mà wúrá  ídrɨ ó'dɨ́ e'dózʉ́.

title: Ãlíríkí Ꞌi Ãzíla Drị̃ꞌbị́ Na Kî
description: Izonzi na mụ kí ijijá gá ị̃tụ́kã ãcí sĩ. Uja kí drị̃ mụle ru wẽlé ị̃yị́ agâlé wó kí mụ ru delé wẽ agá ꞌbo, ị̃tụ̂ ukó rá ãzíla lẽ ꞌbã cẹ̃ kí mbẽlẽ-mbẽlẽ lị́cọ́ gá. Gẹ̃rị̃ agá ꞌdãá, Nõzĩbélẽ ịsụ́ aꞌbe ĩꞌdi ꞌbã ŋálí imbe gá rĩ vúlêlé ũgũgõ. Ị́jọ́ ꞌdĩ sĩ, gõ vúlé mụlé ĩꞌdi ꞌbã ŋálî ndrụ̃ trũ áꞌdụ̂sĩ. Ĩꞌdi ꞌbã gõŋá sĩ mụjó ŋálí ndrụ̃ trũ rĩ uja ru ĩꞌdiní ndú iꞌdóŋá gá kpere ãsị̃ŋá gá.

title: Nozibele N'Echitukia Isato
description: Three young girls go to the forest to gather some wood on a hot day. There was enough, so they thought, and they can swim until it got cooler after gathering the wood. By the time they finished swimming, it was already late and they had to rush back home. Further away, Nozibele realises that she has left her beads behind. She goes back on her own after her friends refuses to go back with her. Nozibele's journey takes a dramatic turn from there on. Read on to find out what happens to Nozibele.

title: Pendo kgomo ya rena
description: Kanegelo ka ga kgomo ya mmamoratwa.
author: Motlhago Sara Mohale

title: Wangoina alindirira bwongo
description: Ensonga lwaki engoina nkambwe eri abantu. (Olufumo luno lwafumibwa mu musomo gwa abasomesa ogwali Kimberly,  2016).
author: Joseph  Mukwaya

title: Lukanyakanya lwa Namukuru
description: Pfene li shavha na lukanyakanya.
author: Yvonne Mulovhedzi

description: The man in this story is so tall that everything around him is too short or too small. He solves this problem by creating things to match his size.
author: Avec la contribution du Comité ASL

title: Pendo kgomo ya rona
description: Kgomo e e rategang.

title: Xikanyakanya xa Masesi

description: Ikwena yechesia abanabayo obulasubira omundu. Omundu alinende obwongo obunji.

title: Kamarofu Ka Kuukhu
description: The little girl is curious as she watches her grandma preparing to ripen bananas.  Where grandma stores the bananas to ripen remains top secret to the disappointment of her grandchild. But how long does it take before the grandchild discovers grandma's secret?
author: Cornelius Wekunya

title: Professora Akinyi
description: Sobre uma professora maravilhosa e o que ela nos ensina.
author: Translators without Borders

description: Uma cabra encontra um lobo na floresta, e…
author: Translators without Borders

title: Tamara starts school
description: Starting school is a big step in the life of any child.
author: Soila Murianka

title: Ntswele ya hina i Pendo
description: Xitori hi ntswele ya ndyangu leyi rhandziwaka ngopfu.
author: Mkomati John Mongwe

title: Die Dansende Boerbok
description: ‘n Boerbok het verdwaal in die bos en ‘n wolf gewaar. Die wolf wou haar eet maar sy wou gelukkig sterf. Sy het begin dans en die wolf het op sy kitaar begin speel. Honde het die geraas gehoor en kom kyk. Toe die wolf die honde sien het hy weggehardloop want hy was bang vir hulle. Die boerbok het aangehou dans want sy was vry van die wolf.
author: Kayla Haarhoff

title: Omwegesa Akinyi
description: Omwegesa omurungi nebyamaani, ebyatwegesa nka, enyuguta, erangi, nembazo.
author: Nathanael  Mugasa

title: Die Luis Wat Doodgedruk Is
description: Lendaba imayelana nezinsizwa ezaziyofuna izinkomo zaze zahlwelawa,ngawo lowo mnyama zabona umuzi okhanyayo. Zaya khona zayocela indawo yokulala kanti umuzi wentwala. Yabanika ukudla intwala.

description: Deux jeunes hommes ayant perdu les vaches qu'ils surveillaient cherchent leurs bêtes jusqu'à ce qu'il soit très tard. Il voient une maison avec une lumière allumée, et décident d'y entrer. Un pou leur offre à manger et à boire, et quitte la maison. Les jeunes hommes acceptent l'hospitalité du pou, mais le regrettent par la suite.

description: Lendaba imayelana nezinsizwa ezaziyofuna izinkomo zaze zahlwelawa, ngawo lowo mnyama zabona umuzi okhanyayo. Zaya khona zayocela indawo yokulala kanti umuzi wentwala. Yabanika ukudla intwala.
author: Skosana ES

title: እንሰሳትን እንቁጠር

title: Intwala eyatyunyuzwayo
description: Abafana ababini balahlekelwa ziinkomo. Bahambe bayokuzikhangela. Ngorhatya,  bakifa emzini wentwala. Ingaba kuzakuqhubeka ntoni emzini walentwala?
author: Nokuthula Bernelee Dyonase

title: لنعد الحيوانات
description: ثلاثة جواميس وأربعة طيور ذاهبون أيضا لشرب الماء
author: Maaouia Haj Mabrouk

title: A Cabra E a Faca Da Hiena
description: A cabra pegou a faca da hiena emprestada, mas ainda está procurando por ela.
author: Translators without Borders

description: Evarekosure ntateko zongwa zonene meparu lyomunona.

description: Sukɔm de mmoa no nyinaa. Kenkan wɔn berɛ a wɔn rekɔ nom nsuo.
author: Henrietta Afrani (OLE Ghana)

title: Intwala eyachotshwa
description: Izinsizwa ezimbili zilahlekelwe izinkomo. Zayozifuna izinkomo kwaze kwahlwa. Ngawo lowo mnyama,  zibona umuzi okhanyayo,  zingene. Lona umuzi wentwala. Intwala ibanikeza ukudla nesiphuzo. Izinsizwa ziyalwamukela usizo lwentwala,  kodwa ngamuva,  zibuye zizisole.
author: Zimbili Dlamini

title: Mudededzi Akinyi
description: Tshitori tshavhudi nga ha mudededzi wa u luga na zwine a ri funza.
author: Yvonne Mulovhedzi

title: Kuverenga mhuka
description: Mhuka dzese dzine nyota. Dziverenge padzinoenda kunonwa mvura.

title: Goat and Hyena's knife
description: Goat borrowed Hyena's knife,  and she is still looking for it.

title: Mudyondzisi Baloyi
description: Xitori xo koma na ku olova xa mudyondzisi wa kahle na leswi a hi dyondzisaka swona.

description: Abasore babiri bemeye gucumbikirwa no kugaburirwa n'inda,  ariko nyuma baje kubyicuza.

title: Kanyana
description: Kanyana ni umukobwa wubaha ababyeyi be kandi akanabafasha mu mirimo yabo ya buri munsi.
author: Niyifasha Epimaque

title: Shinser she á bvəʼəyin
description: Wónlě nsùm ámóʼó dzə̀ abaà ve á shiy anàʼ. Anàʼ viyi nen lò,  e lày. Áwune táʼ ndzə sə́n. Áwune lòo leéy,  e nèn yèn lav yìmòʼ a və́yí bán fo,  e nèn nə̀ə́ e lav fèy. Á nəə́,  shinser shi nèn fò viyíkìr aáwune,  e fò kifá ke á nó. Áwune shéʼrí mo shinsèr shi səəsin áwune,  e nèn lò fo bàm,  a rə̀m ntéŋ.
author: Beatrice Tafon Takeh

title: Arach, inhebantu omwatikirivu
description: Arach yali mugunha gha mwaami ku matwaale age Quarolopint. Yali mulungi inho nga buli musaadha mu matwaale ayendha kwefuunza bulungi bwe aye okwebonagho nho'bulolobavubwaletala bulungi okuba'otin'omubi asingayo.
author: Antony Kisambira

title: Mbuzi na kisu cha Fisi
description: Mbuzi anaomba kisu cha Fisi,  hadi leo bado anakitafuta.
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Donne Sɔrebo
description: Kɔnyuuri kpɛ la a donne zaa. Sɔre a, saŋa na a naŋ tuuro taa gɛrɛ a koɔ nyuubu.
author: Gilbieri Jonathan (OLE Ghana)

title: Chicago to St. Louis: Crossing the Land of Lincoln
Ombuli N'Akambe Ka Mpiti
description: Nikhukhwoola ari asihentsa kumubano kwa namuunyu.

title: Binkɔbri Kalibu
description: Binkɔbri maa zaa gbaai konyuri. Kalimiba bɛ ni chani   kom maa nyubu.
author: Bugzuah Charles Midzira (OLE Ghana)

title: Arach, the proud princess
description: Arach was a daughter to the chief in the land of Quarolopinat. She was so beautiful that all the men of the land wanted to own her beauty but her pride and arrogance made her beauty as good as ugly.
author: Ahukana Mercy

title: Enffa Y'Ensekere
description: Abavubuka babiri abaali banonnya ente zaabwe, obudde ne bubazibako. Balaba ekitangaala mu nnyumba mwe bayingira. Ensekere n'ebawa ebyokulya n'okunywa,n'egenda. Abavubuka bakiriza obubuddamu bw'ensekere, naye oluvanyuma ne bejjusa.
author: Robert Ssebukyu

title: Arakiliko
description: Young boys like going out into forests to hunt for birds. They use catapults for hunting birds.  This is a story about a young boy who found and shot a Hornbill as he was walking through the village. A Hornbill is commonly found in forests in tropical Africa. He was very excited and offered the bird to an old man in the village who liked eating anything given to him.
author: Saidi Omar Dramani

title: Wanambusi Ni Kumubano Kwa Namuunyu
description: Nikhukhwoola ari asihentsa kumubano kwa namuunyu.
author: Wekunya Cornelius

title: Lohwehi Kanemi
description: Ngu kuma lohwe ɔmɛ tsuo yee. Kane mɛ be nɛ a yaa nu nyuɔ.
author: Elizabeth Ocansey (OLE Ghana)

title: Enhumba eyatemwa entanda
description: Abalenzi babiri baikiriza okusangaazibwa omuntu eyali atafaayo aye baakyeidhusa.
author: Abdul Maged Mbago

title: The Hornbill
description: A young boy finds and shoots a Hornbill. He gives the dead bird to an old man in the village, who cooks and eats the Hornbill.
author: Bukheye Mulongo Christopher

title: Counting animals
description: All the animals are thirsty. Count them as they go to drink water.
author: Clare Verbeek

title: Embuzi n'akambe k'empiti
description: Embuzi yeeyazikwa akambe ka empiti,  era eka kanhonia.

title: Ensekere ensekembule
description: Abasulube babiri baikiriza okubudhabudhibwa ensekere,  aye baamala beidhusa.

title: Lãwo Xexlẽ
description: Tsikɔ le lãwo katã wum. Xlẽ wo esi woyina tsi no ge.

title: Buuwa Ni Kundunŋu Suwa
description: Buu daa pɛaŋi kundunŋu suwa,  ka u naku kpalim mbori kaziiya.
author: R.Y. Tongo and J. Salifu  (OLE Ghana)

title: O Piolho Esmagado
description: Dois jovens perdem as suas vacas e ficam à procura dos animais até se fazer tarde. Vêem uma casa com luz e entram. Um piolho dá-lhes comida e bebida e vai-se embora. Os jovens aceitam a hospitalidade do piolho mas acabam por se arrepender.

title: Eŋŋaaŋa

title: Mbowadoma Nkanee

title: Buuwa Ni Kundunŋu Suwa
description: Buu daa pɛaŋi kundunŋu suwa,  ka u naku kpalim mbori kaziiya.
author: R.Y. Tongo and J. Salifu  (OLE Ghana)

title: Cunning Madola
description: One harvests what one sows!
author: Mariam Yusuf

title: Liŋaasa (Ŋaa, Ŋaa)
description: Umusooleli mutweela waatsya wanyoola liŋaasa, waalilasa libaale. Waalisuta, waaliyilila umusaakhulu mutweela mu shaalo isho. Naye umusaakhulu uyo waaliteekha, waalilya.

title: Compter Les Animaux

title: Madola mjanja
description: Mtu huvuna anachopanda!
author: African Storybook

title: Omusyo gwe Embitsi ne embuzi
description: Embuzi ekatiza Embitsi omusyo,  nahati ekitaaha neguronda.

title: Limugo Dabbaaji Ladde
description: Dabbaaji fuu e nana ɗonka. Limuɗi no ɗi njahirta yaroygo ndiyam.
author: Abdullahi Aadamu Bappa

title: Boo Ne Gbengber So'o
description: Boo peŋ gbengber so'o,  ka o kpelim bɔr ka zi'i.
author: J. K. A. Anankor and E. T. Anoeni (OLE Ghana)

title: Mudhoola omukombe omukumpania

title: A canoa da Sara

author: Little Zebra Books

title: Kooloi Kanemɔ

author: Divine Apedo (OLE Ghana)

title: Ekibwala
description: Omwisuka ayagaana era aleega ekibwala. Agha ekinhonhi ekifu omusaadha omukaire ku kyalo,  afumba era alya ebibwala.
author: Enocha Tasingika

title: Asɔbɔaya Be Ke Karga
description: Achukoŋ koAsɔbɔaya na kikɛ. Karga amo a ka bee yɔ nɛ a ya nuu nchu ere.
author: Joseph Kipo Ahiah (OLE Ghana)

title: Sara se kano
description: Sara is helping people and animals across the river in her canoe,  but the elephant wants to cross,  too!
author: Anita  Van Zyl

title: Ikeny Lokut
description: ikeny lokut loatuman lo anyami erot
author: Simon Ipoo

title: The boy who ran away

author: Ingrid Schechter

title: Omuvubuka eyaduka n'agenda

description: Dukkanin dabbobin suna jin kishirwa. A kidaya su a yayin da suke tafiya wajen shan ruwa.
author: SANI MASAMA GARBA

title: New Mexico's Route 66: An Enchanting Road

description: Arend en Hen se vriendskaap gaan uit die deur. (This storybook was donated by LAPA Publishers.)
author: Jaco jacobs

title: Ukubala izilwane
description: Bala ezilwane eziyophuza. Kwenzekani uma ibhubesi lefika ukuzophuza?
author: African Storybook

title: Ngalawa ya Sara
description: Sara is helping people and animals across the river in her canoe,  but the elephant wants to cross,  too!
author: Manuel Gripa Kandodo

title: Omulenzi eyalumuka wo
description: Emboozi egemagana ku mbera mu maka nga omuntu akoze ensobi.

title: Monkey Friend
description: The poem is about a young child who loves his monkey friend.

title: Vara Garem
description: Nanyɔm jege vara maama mo. Gare ba ba na vei se ba nyɔ na.
author: Joseph Kandwe (OLE Ghana)

title: Mwadiya wa Sara
description: Sara is helping people and animals across the river in her canoe,  but the elephant wants to cross,  too!
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Eagle's needle
description: Hen loses Eagle's family heirloom. (This story was donated by LAPA Publishers.).
author: Jaco jacobs

title: Okaana ka fadukapo
description: Okahokololo aka ota ka popi kombinga yekwatafano lomeumbo nge pe na umwe a ninga sha shapuka.
author: Nelly  Ndafyaalako

title: Two-Step Dancing with Ghosts at Arizona Club
Aria Anyu Ma Angu E`dapi Ri Ni Arioti Ofezuri
description: A young hunter follows the lead of a honeyguide bird to a bees' hive full of ripe honey. Instead of rewarding the bird with a share of the honey, he chases it away. The next time the young man tries to find honey, the bird gets his revenge!

title: Xamarina ǃgôas
description: Hoara xamarin ge a ǁgâsa. ǁGaman karao,  ǃgôa nî.
author: Mattheus  Goraseb

title: Okamati haka fadhu kapo
description: Oka hokololo hano ota ka kwa ndjangele no maiuvo goomo family ngele omuntu gumwe aningi oshiima shapuka.
author: Hamukoto  Efraim

title: Dikuwungwa Dya A-Sara
description: Sara is helping people and animals across the river in her canoe, but the elephant wants to cross too!
author: © 2016 Little Zebra Books

title: The Honeyguide's revenge
description: A young hunter follows a honey-guide bird to a bees' hive full of ripe honey. Instead of rewarding the bird with a share of the honey,  he chases it away. The next time the young man tries to find honey,  the bird gets its revenge!
author: Zulu folktale

title: Kũtala Nyamũ
description: Nyamũ syonthe syĩna waũni. Syendete kũnyw'a Kĩw'o. Itale.
author: Anna Kula

title: Mwaaceya a Saara
description: Sara is helping people and animals across the river in her canoe,  but the elephant wants to cross,  too!
author: Estevâo Campama

title: Omuzandu Nga tupuka
description: Okahungi ohunga nomundu ngazunda monganda.
author: Auhe  Tjaveondja

title: The Honeyguide's Revenge
description: A young hunter follows a honey-guide bird to a bees' hive full of ripe honey. Instead of rewarding the bird with a share of the honey, he chases it away. The next time the young man tries to find honey, the bird gets its revenge!
author: M. Davidson

title: Kubara Inyamaswa
description: Inyamaswa zose zifite inyota. Zibare uko zijya kunywa amazi.
author: Jean Paul Harelimana

title: Ekalawa ya Saara
description: Sara is helping people and animals across the river in her canoe,  but the elephant wants to cross,  too!
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Mumati ogu ga tjwayukire
description: Esanseko eli kuna hamene komalizuvho gemekoro lyomuntu ogu ana rugana yininke yoyidona.
author: Djaupyu  Siteketa

title: ǀAes ra (ǁî-) aitsama ǁgam
description: ǀAes ra (ǁî-) aitsama ǁgam. Nē tsē ta ge ra ǁgamba du ti ǂhôasa. Naniros ase ta gege tsoatsoas.
author: Mattheus  Goraseb

title: Sara's Canoe
description: Sara is helping people and animals across the river in her canoe,  but the elephant wants to cross,  too!
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Kuwahesabu Wanyama
description: Wanyama wote wana kiu. Wahesabu wanapoenda kunywa maji.
author: Susan Kavaya

title: Ukuziphindiselela kweNgede
description: Umfanyana ongumzingeli ulandela uNgede omholela ezidlekeni sezinyosi esigcwele uju. Esikhundleni sokuthi ahlulele ungede uju,  umfanyana uyamxosha uNgede. Ngolunye usuku lapho lomfanyana efuna uju futhi,  uNgede uthola ithuba lokuziphindiselela!
author: Phumy Zikode

title: Young Navajos Study to Save Their Language
Sara Lɛlɛ lɛ
description: Sara miiwa mɛi kɛ kooloi ni amɛfo faa lɛ yɛ elɛlɛ lɛ mli,  shi shwuᴐ hu miitao ni efo faa lᴐ eko!
author: Ezekiel Johnson

title: Ndege-Asali alipiza kisasi
description: Mwindaji kijana anafuata ndege ili kuufikia mzinga wa nyuki uliojaa asali mbivu. Badala yeye kumshukuru ndege kwa kumgawia asali,  anamfukuza. Wakati mwingine kijana anapotafuta asali,  ndege analipiza kisasi!
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Fire's story
description: Fire tells its own story. (This is an adaptation of a Level 1 storybook on this website called "Fire").
author: African Storybook

title: Tanga bibwele
description: Ba bibwele nioso bazali malamu. Tango bango nioso ndenge bakokende komela mayi.
author: Theresa  Nyemba
